cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 13, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 978, Chai Suthammanont Remembrance Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 26 (Thursday, February 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CONNOLLY:
H.R. 978.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H502]

latestAction.text: UNANIMOUS CONSENT REQUEST - Mr. DeSaulnier asked unanimous consent that the ordering of the yeas and nays on the motion that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill H.R. 978 be vacated, to the end that the motion be considered as withdrawn. Agreed to without objection.

title: Chai Suthammanont Remembrance Act of 2021
